channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Netflix wins bidding war for Warner Bros. purchase
item.description: Netflix announced a deal to buy Warner Bros. for $82.7 billion. Barron's writer Paul La Monica joins CBS News with more.

item.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (Dec. 7)
item.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

item.title: Coldest temperatures of the season hit Midwest, Northeast
item.description: The coldest air of the season is invading the Midwest and Northeast as the Mid-Atlantic sees its first snow of the season.

item.title: US consumer sentiment improved this month but remains subdued
item.description: U.S. consumers’ mood improved slightly this month, with worries about inflation easing a bit, but remains gloomy

item.title: WATCH: Trumps attend National Christmas Tree Lighting Ceremony
item.description: President Trump wished the nation a "Merry Christmas" during Thursday night's National Christmas Tree lighting ceremony in Washington, D.C.

item.title: Netflix set to buy Warner Bros. in deal valued at $83 billion
item.description: Netflix has announced that it has entered a “definitive agreement” to acquire Warner Bros. in a deal valued at approximately $83 billion, according to...

item.title: Book excerpt: "My Beloved" by Jan Karon
item.description: The New York Times bestselling author returns to the village of Mitford in her 15th novel featuring Father Tim Kavanagh.

item.title: Shops empty in a Hispanic neighborhood as immigration crackdown comes to Louisiana
item.description: Federal border agents have descended on a Hispanic enclave just outside New Orleans and local business owners are suffering.

item.title: CDC panel votes to stop recommending birth dose of hepatitis B vaccine

item.title: Amy Allen on her love for songwriting, working with Sabrina Carpenter and other pop stars
item.description: Amy Allen, who is up for four Grammys, including songwriter of the year, sits down with Anthony Mason to talk about how she went from a nursing studen...

item.title: WATCH: FBI Director Kash Patel announces arrest in Jan. 6 pipe bomb case
item.description: Patel announced Thursday that authorities arrested a man in connection with the placement of two pipe bombs outside the HQs of the RNC and DNC the nig...

item.title: Man accused of planting pipe bombs before Jan. 6 Capitol attack is charged with explosives offenses
Immigration crackdown in New Orleans has a target of 5,000 arrests. Is that possible?
